data.name: taskgraph-metaprogramming
data.description: The TaskGraph Meta-programming Library is a C++ package that supports run-time code generation - programs that generate code on the fly, then execute it.  And having built a piece of code, you can apply various transformations to it (such as loop interchange and tiling).

evidence: "The TaskGraph Meta-programming Library is a C++ package that supports Run-time code generation" (library/package intended to be used by other code).

"The distribution includes examples that demonstrate performance improvements thanks to two Taskgraph features" and lists algorithms (indicates it is used to generate/transform code for research-relevant computations).
"Requires gcc (not just at build time but also at runtime) and boost (and probably more) * ./configure; make" (installation from source repository, no mention of package managers or binaries).
